item.title: Changeset [1514]: Fix get_pagenum_link() to work with path info permalinks and ...
item.dc:creator: rboren
item.description: Fix get_pagenum_link() to work with path info permalinks and permalinks without trailing slashes. Bug 0002040.

item.title: Ticket #185 (wp-login.php segfaults Apache with PHP5.0.1-dev) updated
item.dc:creator: Brak
item.description:
Confirmed.

However, it's on the PHP end, not the the Wordpress end.

I first upgraded to Wordpress current (4th august) and it still segfaulted. Then I upgraded to PHP 5.0.x-dev (6th august) and it's now working.

item.title: Ticket #214 (When publishing a new post it create 2 paragraph tags) created
item.dc:creator: anonymousbugger
item.description: When writing a new entry and publishing the generated XHTML creates 2 opening and closing P tags in the 'the_content()'

item.title: Ticket #213 (Smilies should be a plug-in) created
item.dc:creator: orangenormal
item.description:
I like to modify the WP code to add my own smilies, however every time I upgrade, my changes are overridden.

Personally, I think the smiley functionality should be a plugin, and not a built-in feature, making it more adaptable to change.

item.title: Changeset [1512]: In sanitize_title(), strip_tags() before sanitizing, not after. In ...
item.dc:creator: rboren
item.description: In sanitize_title(), strip_tags() before sanitizing, not after. In post.php, if post name is empty, pass the post title to the sanitizer.
